title: Google rolls out Privacy Sandbox to use Chrome browsing history for ads
description: Google has started to roll out its new interest-based advertising platform called the Privacy Sandbox, shifting the tracking of user's interests from third-party cookies to the Chrome browser. [...]

title: Microsoft Teams phishing attack pushes DarkGate malware
description: A new phishing campaign is abusing Microsoft Teams messages to send malicious attachments that install the DarkGate Loader malware. [...]
